price: 4. Kaadu korosuy Yalli baxa haysite itte kaat meesiisamkeh.
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
